dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to Simple-EAM
dashboard.createFirstDiagram: Create your first diagram via the Diagrams page.
dashboard.overview: The Enterprise Architecture Management platform provides you with an overview of the complete IT landscape.
dashboard.totalElements: A total of {count} architecture elements have been recorded: {capabilitiesCount} Business Capabilities, {applicationsCount} Applications, {aiComponentsCount} AI Components, {dataObjectsCount} Data Objects, {interfacesCount} Interfaces and {infrastructuresCount} Infrastructure elements. In addition, there are {architecturesCount} Architectures, {principlesCount} Architecture Principles, {diagramsCount} Diagrams and {personsCount} Persons.
dashboard.navigationHint: Use the navigation on the left side to get detailed information about the individual architecture components.

diagramTypeDescriptions.APPLICATION_LANDSCAPE: Overview of all applications and their relationships

messages.multiTabValidated: Multi-tab file successfully validated. {count} valid records found.

export.title: Export Settings
export.previewText: Export includes {entityType} in {format} format with GraphQL field names for direct re-import.
export.relationInfo: ℹ️ Relations are exported as comma-separated IDs to enable direct re-import
export.allEntitiesInfo: Export includes all entity types with their respective fields:
export.diagramExportWarning: Note for Excel/CSV export: Diagrams are exported without their content (diagramJson) as it's too large for Excel cells. All other diagram metadata is available.
export.singleDiagramExportWarning: Note for Excel/CSV export: The "diagramJson" field is not exported as diagram content is too large for Excel cells. All other metadata is available.

messages.csvNotAvailable: CSV format is not available for exporting all data. Use Excel or JSON.

management.title: ⚠️ Admin Area - Data Management
management.warning: Here you can delete data from the database. These actions cannot be undone! Make sure you have a backup before deleting data.
management.deleteDescription: Deletes all entries of the selected data type from the database.
management.completeDeleteWarning: WARNING: This action will delete ALL data from the database! This includes all Business Capabilities, Applications, Data Objects, Interfaces, Persons, Architectures, and Diagrams.
management.deleteAllDescription: This action cannot be undone. Make sure you have a complete backup.
management.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete {entityType}?
management.companyFilterInfo: Deletion will be filtered to the selected company: {companyName}
management.companyFilterDefault: Deletion will be filtered to the selected company.
management.companyDeleteWarning: All data of company "{companyName}" will be permanently deleted!

messages.deleteAllSuccess: All data successfully deleted. {count} records removed.
